Subjects for reporting:

- Financieel
- Personeel
- Ontwikkeling
- Projecten
- Contract management (subsidies)

For each subject there is a separate report. Ultimately the individual reports are combined into a single Management Report. The reports are generated from the same data model. The data model is based on the Archimate standard. The data model is described in the following sections.


Archimate components
- Application component
- Data object component
- Representation (or Report) component
